item.title: The road surface in the right hand lane as you intend to turn right from Ermin street on to the bypass heading for Gloucester is very bad and has damaged one spring on my car already. Equally when you turn left into Ermin Street from same bypass, there is also a very bad road surface. Hucclecote Road was recently resurfaced and I was surprised that this was not done at the same time., 27th March
item.description:
Right hand lane at traffic lights at the end of Ermin Street when you are turning right onto the bypass heading towards Gloucester. Also adjacent lane when heading back to Brockworth when turning left onto Ermin Street from the bypass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Really deep pothole causing vehicle to swerve, 27th March
item.description:
This pothole is very bad and itâ€™s right in the drivers pathway and causes drivers to swerve into the middle of the road into oncoming traffic. I had somebody coming onto my lane trying to avoid it the other day. Please fix it as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Old Bath Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
